name: Burger Zogotep
description:
You've got mail!

It's from your employer: Burger Zogotep.

They want you to help feed the patrons.

There's one problem though:

There's a discount on beer...

The whole town is out to get some!

...Made for the GMTK2020 in around 48 hours by Loupyboy...

Thanks to Wopla for the buildings models, to Lucas for the help on the racing track, and to everyone for the kind support! My first jam's been a real blast, thanks to you guys!
